title: Travelling in China: Through the Open Door
brief_description: From the grandeur of Tien-An Men Square in the centre of Beijing to the elaborate marble boat and richness of the Summer Palace at Quinhuayuan, and the awesome history of the Forbidden Palace, this is an eyecatching travelogue. With Australians now third highest on the list of tourists who visit China, this video is a must for anyone wishing to visit China or learn more about the country.
